SEARCH
Module com.snake.dms_courseworkhilman_hazizi
Package main

Class View

java.lang.Object
main.View
public class View extends Object
The View class in the MVC pattern.
This class is responsible for everything that is shown on the window of the game such as drawing elements on the screen.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    javafx.animation.AnimationTimer
    animationTimer
    This AnimationTimer variable controls the "game loop" which allows the snake to be animated.

    The scene that runs the "game" part of the whole application.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Model model, Controller controller, javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      The method that initializes variables (including those used for the MVC pattern) and the "game" part of the application.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model class in the MVC pattern.
      controller - The Controller class in the MVC pattern.
      stage - The stage taken from the Play class.

    • drawElements

      public void drawElements(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext g)

      Parameters:
      g - The GraphicsContext object used to draw on the canvas.

    • switchToFail

      public void switchToFail() throws IOException
      The method that switches the scene to the Fail Screen when the snake "dies".
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if the given file is not found.

    • switchToMainMenu

      public void switchToMainMenu() throws IOException
      The method that switches the scene to the Main Menu when the Main Menu button is clicked on the Pause Menu.
      Throws:
      IOException - Throws an exception if the given file is not found.

    • drawPause

      public void drawPause()
      The method that draws the Pause Menu when ESC is pressed while the game is not paused.

    • removePause

      public void removePause()
      The method that removes the Pause menu when ESC is pressed while the game is paused or when the Resume button is clicked on the Pause Menu.
